metadata.Description: The incorporation of indigenous and traditional knowledge systems into sustainable energy planning and decision-making processes.

level 1.Description: Integrating traditional knowledge implements building standards that incorporate indigenous practices and wisdom.
Integrating traditional knowledge funds research projects that explore the integration of indigenous knowledge into sustainable energy practices.
Integrating traditional knowledge focuses on renewable energy technologies that align with indigenous values and principles.
Integrating traditional knowledge is integrated in policy development processes to ensure the inclusion of indigenous perspectives and practices.
Integrating traditional knowledge partners with indigenous communities to co-create sustainable energy solutions that respect and incorporate traditional practices.
Integrating traditional knowledge contributes to community empowerment by valuing and utilizing indigenous knowledge in sustainable energy initiatives.
Integrating traditional knowledge monitors knowledge exchange programs that facilitate the sharing of indigenous energy practices and experiences.
Integrating traditional knowledge targets capacity building initiatives to enhance the understanding and application of indigenous energy knowledge.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies provide support and resources for community-based renewable energy projects to empower local communities and promote sustainable development.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies administer feed-in tariff programs to incentivize the production of renewable energy and promote its integration into the grid.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies measure and track the growth of renewable energy capacity to assess the progress towards a sustainable and clean energy future.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies align their activities and initiatives with the Sustainable Development Goals to contribute to the global agenda for sustainable development.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies are government agencies dedicated to promoting and supporting the development of renewable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.
